attributes.action: keep Dorset County Hospital's Maternity ward and SCUBU open!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dorset County hospitals maternity dept and SBCU has been threated with closure due to the need to cut costs. 

It is the only maternity unit in West Dorset and closing it would mean that alot people would have over an hours drive to hospital if they were in labour.

It would also mean that much a needed special baby care unit would close, risking the lives of many very poorly babies.

We need to get together and make our voices heard. We cannot let this go ahead. Lives will be lost if this unit is closed!


http://www.thisisdorset.net/news/tidnews
